definition: to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: When you are … living in disobedience …
A woman should learn in quietness and full submission.
sentences.chinese: 女人要沉靜學道，一味地順服。

sentences.english: Puritan women expected to submit to their husbands and to focus on homemaking as their career.
sentences.chinese: 清教徒婦女期望能順服自己的丈夫並專注於家務上。

sentences.english: Moses believed and obeyed, and water gushed from the stone.
sentences.chinese: 摩西相信且順服，水因而從石頭中泉湧而出。

sentences.english: Wives are told in Ephesians 5:22 to submit to their husbands as to the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 以弗所書5:22節說妻子當順服丈夫，如同順服主。

sentences.english: Wives are told in Ephesians 5:22 to submit to their husbands as to the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 以弗所書5:22節說妻子當順服丈夫，如同順服主。

sentences.english: You can't call Jesus your Lord when you refuse to obey him.
sentences.chinese: 你若不順服他就不能稱耶穌爲主。

sentences.english: You must submit to the lordship of Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 你必須順服耶穌基督的主權。

sentences.english: How did Solomon's intermarriages influence his devotion to the Lord?
sentences.chinese: 所羅門與外邦女子的婚姻如何影響到他對神的順服？

sentences.english: Faith cannot be severed from repentance and obedience.
sentences.chinese: 信心，不可從悔改和順服分開。

sentences.english: From the top down, we must keep our focus on obeying Him and establishing His authority.
sentences.chinese: 由上而下，我們必須專注在順服主並建造祂的權柄。

sentences.english: Let a woman learn in silence with full submission.
sentences.chinese: 女人要沉靜學道，一味地順服。

sentences.english: And all the princes, and the mighty men, and all the sons likewise of king David, submitted themselves unto Solomon the king.
sentences.chinese: 衆首領和勇士，並大衛王的衆子，都順服所羅門王。

sentences.english: Worshipers are called to hear God and to serve him in obedience every day.
sentences.chinese: 敬拜的人每一天都蒙召聆聽神的話和順服事奉祂。

sentences.english: Certainly, if this is when God calls you, we have to obey.
sentences.chinese: 若你真是在這時候才受到神的呼召，那我們當順服。

sentences.english: You do it without delay. Every parent knows that delayed obedience is really disobedience.
sentences.chinese: 每一位作父母都知道，延遲的順服就是不順服。

definition: to listen and obey/to comply with/to heed/to hearken
to follow/(of a woman) to get married/(old) attendant
